welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Guadalupe Nuevo, Philippines! This charming city is known for its vibrant culture, delicious cuisine, and friendly locals. Get ready to explore and immerse yourself in all that Guadalupe Nuevo has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Also known as the Centennial Terminal, it is exclusively used by Philippine Airlines for their domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights for multiple airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Also known as the Domestic Terminal, it serves as the hub for all domestic flights of Philippine Airlines and Cebu Pacific.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi for up to 2 hours per day.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal of Baler Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal of Baler Airport, handling all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.
